channel.title: The R Workshop Series on QCBS R Workshop Series
channel.description: Recent content in The R Workshop Series on QCBS R Workshop Series

item.title: WK-01 - Introduction to R
item.description: All workshops WK 1: Intro to R WK 2: Data manipulation WK 3: Data visualisation WK 4: Linear models WK 5: Programming WK 6: GLMs WK 7: LMMs WK 8: GAMs WK 9: Multivariate WK 10: Advanced multivariate Workshop 1: Introduction to R In this introductory R Workshop you will learn what R open-source statistical software is, why you should absolutely start using it, and all the first steps to help you get started in R.

item.title: WK-02 - Loading and manipulating data in R
item.description: All workshops WK 1: Intro to R WK 2: Data manipulation WK 3: Data visualisation WK 4: Linear models WK 5: Programming WK 6: GLMs WK 7: LMMs WK 8: GAMs WK 9: Multivariate WK 10: Advanced multivariate Workshop 2: Loading and manipulating data in R In this workshop, you will learn how to load, view, and manipulate your data in R.

item.title: WK-03 - Introduction to data visualisation with `ggplot2`
item.description: All workshops WK 1: Intro to R WK 2: Data manipulation WK 3: Data visualisation WK 4: Linear models WK 5: Programming WK 6: GLMs WK 7: LMMs WK 8: GAMs WK 9: Multivariate WK 10: Advanced multivariate Workshop 3: Introduction to data visualization in R using ggplot2 In this workshop, you will improve your data manipulation and visualization skills using ggplot2.

item.title: WK-04 - Linear models
item.description: All workshops WK 1: Intro to R WK 2: Data manipulation WK 3: Data visualisation WK 4: Linear models WK 5: Programming WK 6: GLMs WK 7: LMMs WK 8: GAMs WK 9: Multivariate WK 10: Advanced multivariate Workshop 4: Linear models in R In this workshop, you will learn how to implement basic linear models commonly used in ecology such as simple regression, analysis of variance (ANOVA), analysis of covariance (ANCOVA), and multiple regression in R.

item.title: WK-05 - Programming in R
item.description: All workshops WK 1: Intro to R WK 2: Data manipulation WK 3: Data visualisation WK 4: Linear models WK 5: Programming WK 6: GLMs WK 7: LMMs WK 8: GAMs WK 9: Multivariate WK 10: Advanced multivariate Workshop 5: Programming in R This workshop focuses on basic programming in R.

item.title: WK-06 - Generalized linear models
item.description: All workshops WK 1: Intro to R WK 2: Data manipulation WK 3: Data visualisation WK 4: Linear models WK 5: Programming WK 6: GLMs WK 7: LMMs WK 8: GAMs WK 9: Multivariate WK 10: Advanced multivariate Workshop 6: Generalized linear models in R A significant limitation of linear models is that they cannot accommodate response variables that do not have a normal error distribution.

item.title: WK-07 - Linear and generalized linear mixed models
item.description: All workshops WK 1: Intro to R WK 2: Data manipulation WK 3: Data visualisation WK 4: Linear models WK 5: Programming WK 6: GLMs WK 7: LMMs WK 8: GAMs WK 9: Multivariate WK 10: Advanced multivariate Workshop 7: Linear and generalized linear mixed models (LMM and GLMM) in R Mixed effects models allow ecologists to overcome a number of limitations associated with traditional linear models.

item.title: WK-08 - Generalized additive models
item.description: All workshops WK 1: Intro to R WK 2: Data manipulation WK 3: Data visualisation WK 4: Linear models WK 5: Programming WK 6: GLMs WK 7: LMMs WK 8: GAMs WK 9: Multivariate WK 10: Advanced multivariate Workshop 8: Generalized additive models in R The goal of this workshop will be to first examine what is a non-linear model, and how Generalized Additive Models (GAM) allow us to handle non-linear relationships.

item.title: WK-09 - Multivariate analyses
item.description: All workshops WK 1: Intro to R WK 2: Data manipulation WK 3: Data visualisation WK 4: Linear models WK 5: Programming WK 6: GLMs WK 7: LMMs WK 8: GAMs WK 9: Multivariate WK 10: Advanced multivariate Workshop 9: Multivariate analyses in R In this workshop, you will learn the basics of multivariate analyses that will allow you to reveal patterns in your community composition data.

item.title: WK-10 - Advanced multivariate analyses
item.description: All workshops WK 1: Intro to R WK 2: Data manipulation WK 3: Data visualisation WK 4: Linear models WK 5: Programming WK 6: GLMs WK 7: LMMs WK 8: GAMs WK 9: Multivariate WK 10: Advanced multivariate Workshop 10: Advanced multivariate analyses in R In this workshop, you will learn how to perform advanced multivariate analyses on community data.
